subject: Would you like to see more cash in your purse?
body:
As a business you have been preapproved to receive 46992 USD TODAY!

No hassle at all, completely unsecured.
There are no hidden costs or fees.
Worried that your credit is less than perfect? Not an issue.

Give us a ring, now..

1-877-699.7817

Turn your dream, into a reality, is that not worth two minutes of your time?

1-877-699.7817

No more waking up next to a big blonde or redhead he had picked up somewhere the night before - a lass who usually looked like a queen at midnight and a goblin at ten the next morning. The fact that he had been searching for traces of a hotshot writer named Paul Sheldon was reported, but Kushners disappearance had not been linked, even speculatively, with Pauls own.

Lee Porter
